example.code: PS C:\> $policy1 = '{"Version":"2012-10-17","Statement":{"Effect":"Allow","Action":"dynamodb:*","Resource":"arn:aws:dynamodb:us-west-2:123456789012:table/","Condition":{"DateGreaterThan":{"aws:CurrentTime":"2015-08-16T12:00:00Z"}}}}' PS C:\> $policy2 = '{"Version":"2012-10-17","Statement":{"Effect":"Allow","Action":"dynamodb:*","Resource":"arn:aws:dynamodb:us-west-2:123456789012:table/"}}' PS C:\> Get-IAMContextKeysForCustomPolicy -PolicyInputList $policy1,$policy2
example.description: This example fetches all the context keys present in the provided policy json.In order to provide multiple policies you can provide as comma separated list of values.
